'Smegma Plays Merzbow Plays Smegma' (also known as 'Plays') is a collaborative
album between Smegma and Merzbow, in which the artists reworks material
submitted by each other. As Tim/Kerr was part of PolyGram, this is
one of the only Merzbow releases on a major label.

The CD booklet claims the disc is split into fifty tracks, and to "use shuffle
play for unique compositions every time", but in fact only has two tracks.
